title: Diophantine sets 2: union and intersection. Monotone Boolean algebra

blocks.name: diophin
blocks.content: If two sets are Diophantine, so is their intersection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
